channel.title: How do you make it so you get money for crafting a gem on a 317
channel.description: I wana make it so you get money if u craft a gem instead of a amulet so people dont gota go back and forth all the time

item.title: How do you make it so you get money for crafting a gem on a 317
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Find

public void crafting(int skillAdd, int itemDelete, int itemAdd, int skillNeeded) { if (playerLevel[12] < skillNeeded) { sM("You need at least " + skillNeeded + " crafting to craft this."); return; } addSkillXP(skillAdd, 12); if (itemDelete != 1629) { sM("You craft the gem and receive an amulet."); } deleteItem(itemDelete, getItemSlot(itemDelete), 1); addItem(itemAdd, 1); setAnimation(885); }

Replace
addItem(itemAdd, 1);
With
addItem(995, Amount);
Change amount to how much you want to give.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make it so you get money for crafting a gem on a 317
